title: CFD Score Calculation
text: implementation CFD score Doench et al 2016. reference implementation CFD score calculation, available implementations either incomplete (focusing mismatch penalties) known contain bug calculation DNA-bulge containing alignments.

title: CFD Score Calculation
text: R run: R package devtools must installed.

title: CFDscoRe: CFD Score Calculation — CFDscoRe-package
text: Implements CFD calculation (including bulges) described Doench et al 2016

title: CFDscoRe: CFD Score Calculation — CFDscoRe-package
text: Maintainer: Sol Shenker sol.shenker@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: CFD Score — cfd_score
text: Calculates CFD Score given guide/target site alignment.

title: CFD Score — cfd_score
text: rna Character representation guide portion guide/target site alignment. represented DNA, valid characters include '','C','G','T','-'. Must 20 nucleotides long. dna Character representation target portion guide/target site alignment. represented DNA, valid characters include '','C','G','T','-'. length requirement. pam Character representation inferred PAM. 'GG' PAM receive penalty.

title: CFD Score — cfd_score
text: CFD score, numeric quantity 0 1 represents fraction guide activity

title: Fast CFD Score — fast_cfd_score
text: Calls Cpp implementation bulged CFD score calculation.

title: Fast CFD Score — fast_cfd_score
text: alignment Data Frame Character Vector columns 'guide', 'genome', 'pam'. strict length-1 logical vector indicating whether guide must exactly 20 nt long. strict, positions labeled relative nucleotide closest PAM, identified position 20.

title: Fast CFD Score — fast_cfd_score
text: data.frame returned one row genome sequence provided, containing optimal alignment CFD score, information location alignment.

title: CFD-Optimal Alignment — optimal_alignment
text: Uses modified Needleman-Wunsch algorithm calculate alignment maximum CFD score.

title: CFD-Optimal Alignment — optimal_alignment
code: optimal_alignment(   query,   genome,   allow_bulge = TRUE,   search_both_strands = TRUE )

title: CFD-Optimal Alignment — optimal_alignment
text: allow_bulge Length-1 logical vector indicating whether alignment algorith allowed generate alignments contain bulges. search_both_strands Length-1 logical vector indicating whether reverse-complement sequence searched alignment guide. rna Character representation guide. represented DNA, valid characters include '','C','G','T'. Must 20 nucleotides long. dna Character representation target target sequences search alignment. represented DNA, valid characters include '','C','G','T'. length requirement.

title: CFD-Optimal Alignment — optimal_alignment
text: data.frame returned one row genome sequence provided, containing optimal alignment CFD score, information location alignment.
